```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
#read in data
mono_lake <- read.csv(here("data", "mono_lake_annual_levels.csv"), skip = 5) %>% 
  clean_names()

mono_lake %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, lake_level_feet_above_sea_level, color = lake_level_feet_above_sea_level)) +
  geom_point(shape = 16, size = 1, show.legend = FALSE) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_line(show.legend = FALSE) +
  scale_color_gradient(low = "#0091ff", high = "#f0650e")

#visualize data
mono_lake %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = lake_level_feet_above_sea_level)) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = 6370, ymax = lake_level_feet_above_sea_level)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal()
```
